title: Sausage and butterbean casserole
description: Sausages, tinned beans and tomatoes are a classic combo for a cheap and flavoursome casserole. With its crunchy parsley topping, this version of sausage stew is super-irresistible. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.Try freezing in portion-sized containers - it will keep for up to 2 months.
ingredients: 1 x 400g/14oz tin butter beans, rinsed and drained
500ml/18fl oz chicken stock, made from stock cube
salt and freshly ground black pepper
